task.name: importnro
task.shortdescription: Convert NOSTAR data into a CASA visibility file (MS)
task.description: Task importnro enables one to convert the data obtained with the NRO45m telescope into the CASA MS2 format. At this moment, only the OTF data (NOSTAR data) obtained with the SAM45 spectrometer is supported, and the OTF data obtained with the other spectrometers (e.g., AOS) and the PSW data (NEWSTAR data) are outside of scope (Jan./25/2017)

param.name: infile
param.description: Name of input NOSTAR data Default: none

param.name: outputvis
param.shortdescription: Root name of the ms to be created. Note the .ms is NOT added
param.description:
Root name of the ms to be created. Note the .ms is NOT added Default: none
Example: outputvis='myms.ms'

param.name: overwrite
param.description: Over write an existing MS(s) Default: False (do not overwrite) Options: False|True

param.name: parallel
param.description: Turn on parallel execution Default: False (serial execution) Options: False|True

task.example: FOR MORE INFORMATION, SEE THE TASK PAGES OF IMPORTNRO IN CASA DOCS: https://casa.nrao.edu/casadocs/
